Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli;Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus;yeast Candida albicans.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Possesses antifungal activity against C. albicans and is also active against E. coli and S. aureus.

Literature.Title: Pseudin-2 an antimicrobial peptide with low hemolytic activity from the skin of the paradoxical frog.
Literature.Author: Olson L 6rd, Soto AM, Knoop FC, Conlon JM.

Literature.Title: Pseudin-2: an antimicrobial peptide with low hemolytic activity from the skin of the paradoxical frog.
